00020 // Block identifiers
00021 enum PSPBlockID {
00022         PSP_IMAGE_BLOCK = 0,                    // (0)  General Image Attributes Block (main)
00023         PSP_CREATOR_BLOCK,                              // (1)  Creator Data Block (main)
00024         PSP_COLOR_BLOCK,                                // (2)  Color Palette Block (main and sub)
00025         PSP_LAYER_START_BLOCK,                  // (3)  Layer Bank Block (main)
00026         PSP_LAYER_BLOCK,                                // (4)  Layer Block (sub)
00027         PSP_CHANNEL_BLOCK,                              // (5)  Channel Block (sub)
00028         PSP_SELECTION_BLOCK,                    // (6)  Selection Block (main)
00029         PSP_ALPHA_BANK_BLOCK,                   // (7)  Alpha Bank Block (main)
00030         PSP_ALPHA_CHANNEL_BLOCK,                // (8)  Alpha Channel Block (sub)
00031         PSP_COMPOSITE_IMAGE_BLOCK,              // (9)  Composite Image Block (sub)
00032         PSP_EXTENDED_DATA_BLOCK,                // (10) Extended Data Block (main)
00033         PSP_TUBE_BLOCK,                                 // (11) Picture Tube Data Block (main)
00034         PSP_ADJUSTMENT_EXTENSION_BLOCK, // (12) Adjustment Layer Block (sub)
00035         PSP_VECTOR_EXTENSION_BLOCK,             // (13) Vector Layer Block (sub)
00036         PSP_SHAPE_BLOCK,                                // (14) Vector Shape Block (sub)
00037         PSP_PAINTSTYLE_BLOCK,                   // (15) Paint Style Block (sub)
00038         PSP_COMPOSITE_IMAGE_BANK_BLOCK, // (16) Composite Image Bank (main)
00039         PSP_COMPOSITE_ATTRIBUTES_BLOCK, // (17) Composite Image Attr. (sub)
00040         PSP_JPEG_BLOCK,                                 // (18) JPEG Image Block (sub)
00041         PSP_LINESTYLE_BLOCK,                    // (19) Line Style Block (sub)
00042         PSP_TABLE_BANK_BLOCK,                   // (20) Table Bank Block (main)
00043         PSP_TABLE_BLOCK,                                // (21) Table Block (sub)
00044         PSP_PAPER_BLOCK,                                // (22) Vector Table Paper Block (sub)
00045         PSP_PATTERN_BLOCK,                              // (23) Vector Table Pattern Block (sub)
00046 };
00047 
00048 
00049 // Bitmap type
00050 enum PSPDIBType {
00051         PSP_DIB_IMAGE = 0,      // Layer color bitmap
00052         PSP_DIB_TRANS_MASK,     // Layer transparency mask bitmap
00053         PSP_DIB_USER_MASK,      // Layer user mask bitmap
00054         PSP_DIB_SELECTION,      // Selection mask bitmap
00055         PSP_DIB_ALPHA_MASK,     // Alpha channel mask bitmap
00056         PSP_DIB_THUMBNAIL       // Thumbnail bitmap
00057 };
00058 
00059 // Channel types
00060 enum PSPChannelType {
00061         PSP_CHANNEL_COMPOSITE = 0,      // Channel of single channel bitmap
00062         PSP_CHANNEL_RED,                        // Red channel of 24 bit bitmap
00063         PSP_CHANNEL_GREEN,                      // Green channel of 24 bit bitmap
00064         PSP_CHANNEL_BLUE                        // Blue channel of 24 bit bitmap
00065 };
00066 
00067 // Possible metrics used to measure resolution
00068 enum PSP_METRIC { 
00069         PSP_METRIC_UNDEFINED = 0,       // Metric unknown
00070         PSP_METRIC_INCH,                        // Resolution is in inches
00071         PSP_METRIC_CM                           // Resolution is in centimeters
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 // Possible types of compression.
00076 enum PSPCompression {
00077         PSP_COMP_NONE = 0,      // No compression
00078         PSP_COMP_RLE,           // RLE compression
00079         PSP_COMP_LZ77,          // LZ77 compression
00080         PSP_COMP_JPEG           // JPEG compression (only used by thumbnail and composite image)
00081 };
00082 
00083 
00084 // Picture tube placement mode.
00085 enum TubePlacementMode {
00086         tpmRandom,              // Place tube images in random intervals
00087         tpmConstant             // Place tube images in constant intervals
00088 };
00089 
00090 // Picture tube selection mode.
00091 enum TubeSelectionMode {
00092         tsmRandom,              // Randomly select the next image in tube to display
00093         tsmIncremental, // Select each tube image in turn
00094         tsmAngular,             // Select image based on cursor direction
00095         tsmPressure,    // Select image based on pressure (from pressure-sensitive pad)
00096         tsmVelocity             // Select image based on cursor speed
00097 };
00098 
00099 // Extended data field types.
00100 enum PSPExtendedDataID {
00101         PSP_XDATA_TRNS_INDEX = 0        // Transparency index field
00102 };
00103 
00104 // Creator field types.
00105 enum PSPCreatorFieldID {
00106         PSP_CRTR_FLD_TITLE = 0,         // Image document title field
00107         PSP_CRTR_FLD_CRT_DATE,          // Creation date field
00108         PSP_CRTR_FLD_MOD_DATE,          // Modification date field
00109         PSP_CRTR_FLD_ARTIST,            // Artist name field
00110         PSP_CRTR_FLD_CPYRGHT,           // Copyright holder name field
00111         PSP_CRTR_FLD_DESC,                      // Image document description field
00112         PSP_CRTR_FLD_APP_ID,            // Creating app id field
00113         PSP_CRTR_FLD_APP_VER,           // Creating app version field
00114 };
00115 
00116 // Creator application identifiers.
00117 enum PSPCreatorAppID {
00118         PSP_CREATOR_APP_UNKNOWN = 0,    // Creator application unknown
00119         PSP_CREATOR_APP_PAINT_SHOP_PRO  // Creator is Paint Shop Pro
00120 };
00121 
00122 // Layer types.
00123 enum PSPLayerType {
00124         PSP_LAYER_NORMAL = 0,                   // Normal layer
00125         PSP_LAYER_FLOATING_SELECTION    // Floating selection layer
00126 };

00139 typedef struct PSPRECT
00140 {
00141         ILuint x1,y1,x2,y2;
00142 } IL_PACKSTRUCT PSPRECT;

00145 {

00148         ILushort        MinorVersion;
00149 } IL_PACKSTRUCT PSPHEAD;

00152 {
00153         ILubyte         HeadID[4];

00156 } IL_PACKSTRUCT BLOCKHEAD;

00158 typedef struct GENATT_CHUNK
00159 {
00160         ILint           Width;
00161         ILint           Height;
00162         ILdouble        Resolution;
00163         ILubyte         ResMetric;

00166         ILushort        PlaneCount;
00167         ILuint          ColourCount;
00168         ILubyte         GreyscaleFlag;
00169         ILuint          SizeOfImage;
00170         ILint           ActiveLayer;
00171         ILushort        LayerCount;
00172         ILuint          GraphicContents;
00173 } IL_PACKSTRUCT GENATT_CHUNK;

00175 typedef struct LAYERINFO_CHUNK
00176 {
00177         ILubyte         LayerType;
00178         PSPRECT         ImageRect;
00179         PSPRECT         SavedImageRect;
00180         ILubyte         Opacity;
00181         ILubyte         BlendingMode;

00183         ILubyte         TransProtFlag;
00184         ILubyte         LinkID;

00186         PSPRECT         SavedMaskRect;

00188         ILubyte         MaskDisabled;
00189         ILubyte         InvertMaskBlend;
00190         ILushort        BlendRange;
00191         ILubyte         SourceBlend1[4];
00192         ILubyte         DestBlend1[4];
00193         ILubyte         SourceBlend2[4];
00194         ILubyte         DestBlend2[4];
00195         ILubyte         SourceBlend3[4];
00196         ILubyte         DestBlend3[4];
00197         ILubyte         SourceBlend4[4];
00198         ILubyte         DestBlend4[4];
00199         ILubyte         SourceBlend5[4];
00200         ILubyte         DestBlend5[4];
00201 } IL_PACKSTRUCT LAYERINFO_CHUNK;
00202 
00203 typedef struct LAYERBITMAP_CHUNK
00204 {
00205         ILushort        NumBitmaps;
00206         ILushort        NumChannels;
00207 } IL_PACKSTRUCT LAYERBITMAP_CHUNK;

00209 typedef struct CHANNEL_CHUNK
00210 {
00211         ILuint          CompLen;
00212         ILuint          Length;
00213         ILushort        BitmapType;
00214         ILushort        ChanType;
00215 } IL_PACKSTRUCT CHANNEL_CHUNK;
00216 
00217 typedef struct ALPHAINFO_CHUNK
00218 {
00219         PSPRECT         AlphaRect;
00220         PSPRECT         AlphaSavedRect;
00221 } IL_PACKSTRUCT ALPHAINFO_CHUNK;
00222 
00223 typedef struct ALPHA_CHUNK
00224 {
00225         ILushort        BitmapCount;
00226         ILushort        ChannelCount;
00227 } IL_PACKSTRUCT ALPHA_CHUNK;
